alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 2:33PM PST until February 27 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Most of the Curry County coast, including the capes and headlands, Port Orford, Ophir, Gold Beach, Pistol River, and significant portions of Highway 101. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and damage unsecured objects. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
